channel.title: Fight Pits
channel.description:
I recently added Player Owned Shops in my server and now i reliezed that when i am in the fight pits the "attack" option doesnt show up. Instead the "view Shop" option which i added shows up.
Any idea how i can get the "attack " option and make it to work.
